SCTX:
Begin bardoor2Script

short door2open

if ( GetJournalIndex TR_Assassins == 85 )
	if ( OnActivate == 1 )
		PlaySound "LockedDoor"
		MessageBox "This door has been magically sealed, and is impossible to open."
		return
	endif
endif

if ( OnActivate == 1 )
	if ( door2open == 0 )
		set door2open to 1
		set "active_assassin_unique".door2check to 1
	else
		set door2open to 0
		set "active_assassin_unique".door2check to 0
	endif	
	Activate
endif
	


End bardoor2Script
